mil3.5.2:1.5_3: mahanto kho mahāsamuddo gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāho,
mil3.5.2:1.5_4: yatthimā pañca mahānadiyo satataṁ samitaṁ appenti,
mil3.5.2:1.6_0: gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī, neva tassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyatī”ti?
mil3.5.2:1.8_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, sāvake mahante parinibbute passitvā jānāmi ‘bhagavā anuttaro’”ti.
